SET(MSI_TARGET msi)
SET(MSI_SOURCES msi.c)
SET(MSI_HEADERS "")

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../libmseed)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(msi ${MSI_HEADERS} ${MSI_SOURCES})

INSTALL(TARGETS msi
	RUNTIME DESTINATION ${SDP_BIN_DIR}
	ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${SDP_LIB_DIR}
	LIBRARY DESTINATION ${SDP_LIB_DIR}
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${MSI_TARGET} mseed)
